case.name: Australian Securities and Investments Commission, in the matter of Bennett Street Developments Pty Ltd v Weerappah (No 2) [2009] FCA 249 (19 March 2009)

citphrases.citphrase: just and equitable ground for winding up
appointment of provisional liquidator on just and equitable ground
whether winding up proceeding should be adjourned
whether provisional liquidator should be appointed
application by australian securities and investments commission to appoint provisional liquidator

considerations relevant to appointment of provisional liquidator, including: apparent or probable insolvency of companies, risk of dissipation of companies' assets, public interest in a prompt independent examination of companies' accounts, financial records and transactions.
